ETH–GBP, ETC–GBP, LTC–GBP and BCH–GBP order books will be entering post-only mode at 1am PT / 9am BST

ETH–GBP, ETC–GBP, LTC–GBP and BCH–GBP order books are now in post-only mode. Limit orders can be placed and cancelled but no matches can occur. Order books will remain in post-only mode for a minimum of 10 minutes
